text:
Dependent on your needs.

*Partials* are good for global Sections, like _Header_, _Footer_, _Sidebar_ etc. Partials are static in place. And placed in Templates.

*Modules* are your first choice if you need configurable content. Like changing colors, or provide different options to the editor. Modules can be placed in DnD Layouts. And can be placed by editors.

A Module is consistent in itself. Partials are more structural.

In your case of a carousel i would use a _lokal module_.
*Lokal*, because the slides can be changed from page to page.
*Module*, because the editor can handle the slide content.
